wikipedia_page.main: William George Davies (born 3 July 1936 in Barry, Glamorgan) is a Welsh former cricketer active from 1954 to 1960 who played for Glamorgan. He appeared in 32 first-class matches as a righthanded batsman who bowled right arm medium fast. He scored 674 runs with a highest score of 64 and took sixteen wickets with a best performance of two for 23.
